item.title: Repost from theskinsensei https://twitter.com/theskinsensei/statuses/1338326582700621825/:
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description:
Repost from theskinsensei https://twitter.com/theskinsensei/statuses/1338326582700621825/:

Cancel niyo na muna:

❌Pagpunta sa gym, coffee shop, indoor resto, mall, masisikip na lugar

❌Pakikipagkita sa jowa, barkada, kamag-anak

Celebrate at home kung ayaw niyong may magkasakit o malagas sa pamilya niyo. Kahit may pera kayo kung puno ang ospital, di kayo magagamot.

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description:
RTing so I know to clean up my mac later

Quoted lorenb's tweet:

So it turns out that Google Chrome was making everything on my computer slow even when it wasn’t running, because it installs something called Keystone which is basically malware.

I made a website because this shouldn’t happen:

https://chromeisbad.com

item.title: Repost from NonTrotski https://twitter.com/NonTrotski/statuses/1337428335824080899/:
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description:
Repost from NonTrotski https://twitter.com/NonTrotski/statuses/1337428335824080899/:

Thread! Author @sparrowtrooper and I are giving away 3 signed copies & 5 eBook copies of her book! @David__Cage @ChrisTheHoff and I were quoted on the back! It’s wild. RT this for a chance to win! Winners will be selected after this tweet gets 100 retweets https://www.amazon.com/How-Games-Get-Made-Stories/dp/1636765483/ref=tmm_pap_swatch_0?_encoding=UTF8&qid=&sr=

item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description:
The internet needs to stop telling me things about Tom Holland’s 3rd spider-man movie :/

Also, the last time a live action Spider-Man movie tried to tell us there was a multiverse… well you know what happened there

item.title: Reply to visakanv's tweet at https://twitter.com/visakanv/statuses/1335151586473984000/:
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description:
Reply to visakanv's tweet at https://twitter.com/visakanv/statuses/1335151586473984000/:

@visakanv It kind of bothers me that the first tweet in that thread says “2019 tweets”. I know that refers to the quoted 2019 thread, but you otherwise typically start your threads with context for the rest of the thread

item.title: New note

item.description: It’s only the 1st week of December and we’re already getting “best of 2020” lists. The year isn’t up yet, who knows what surprises await!

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description:
Streaming some Kaladesh Remastered draft! Watch me be terrible https://www.twitch.tv/twitchyroy #mtg #magicarena #twitch #mtgkld

As predicted; I was indeed terrible. Draft seemed to go well enough, but I made too many mistakes I guess? Seems like this format is not for me.

YT: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=S15AgtyStzw

item.title: New photos
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: Last minute mythic on #magicarena. Also hit master on Eternal last week, so it’s my first double month! #mtg

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: I’ve been binging Perfect Strangers. Fun show (and maybe best theme song), but 80% of the eps are like “Balki says/does something naive, Larry overreacts and gets them into trouble, but it all works out in the end”

item.title: New photos
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: Kaladesh Remastered draft really doesn’t like me; I thought this deck was pretty good, but it was yet another 0-3. D: At least I didn’t waste gems this time. #mtg #magicarena #mtgkld

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: Wasting time wandering through parallel universes

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description:
Streaming some more Kaladesh Remastered draft (ep 2) https://www.twitch.tv/twitchyroy #mtg #magicarena #twitch #mtgkld

Unfortunately, internet was too poor again tonight for streaming :(

Ok, I went ahead and did two drafts which was a terrible idea because I did very poorly both times. (Didn’t bother getting a screenshot of the second result, they were the same!) Sigh, this format is tough. Hopefully I figure it out by next time.

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: It’s a fantasy, but I’m kind of hoping @inquirerdotnet or @PhilstarNews manages to put the word “Meltdown” somewhere on their front page for Nov 18 #DuterteMeltdown

item.title: Repost from ChappellTracker https://twitter.com/ChappellTracker/statuses/1328104778954575873/:
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description:
Repost from ChappellTracker https://twitter.com/ChappellTracker/statuses/1328104778954575873/:

Okay I’m going to try to explain this, so bear with me. On Tiktok, an entire community has come together to create Ratatouille the Musical. What seemed like a joke has become an incredible undertaking. Or not? Here’s how it started, with a call:

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description:
Kaladesh Remastered draft ep 1 https://www.twitch.tv/twitchyroy #mtg #magicarena #twitch #mtgkld

Sadly, internet wasn’t too good so I just cut the stream short. Too bad, so sad

Draft didn’t feel super good, but I managed to break even in the games. No video because no stream. (In hindsight I could have just recorded locally!) Maybe I’ll try streaming a draft again early next week.

item.title: Reply to amirrajan's tweet at https://twitter.com/amirrajan/statuses/1327107332275376129/:
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description:
Reply to amirrajan's tweet at https://twitter.com/amirrajan/statuses/1327107332275376129/:

@amirrajan i dont have much other gamedev experience other than playing with unity a bit, but: I like that I can do most of the work in my text editor, and I like that it simplifies a lot of the work by making assumptions (like the 1280x720 resolution etc) so I can just focus on what I want

item.title: New photos
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: Decided to try a Kaladesh Remastered sealed before diving into draft. Didn’t do particularly well, but at least I got a feel of what the Kaladesh limited format is like (again) #mtg #magicarena #mtgkld

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description:
Pag pinadalhanka ng bill ng meralco sabihan mo sila na mukhang pera

Quoted PhilippineStar's tweet:

‘MUKHANG PERA’

This was President Duterte’s comment when Health Secretary Francisco Duque III reported during a Cabinet meeting that the Philippine Red Cross has resumed conducting COVID-19 swab tests after the PhilHealth paid its close to P1-B debt. | @xtinamen

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: One upside of this election is that I’ve learned a lot about where US states are on the map

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description:
He should just migrate here to the Philippines, thats how 90% of our politicians are

Quoted bmemike's tweet:

@wrongwaygoback I heard something in coverage earlier today and it’s just 100% spot on:

The only two outcomes for Trump is that he wins or the election was stolen. He can never be a loser. It’s just not part of his brand.
